Path to the Tower.HF Near KF Grass Patch 4: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Domain Gossip Stone Drop

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the Groose is loose.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that the Kokiri Sword is as effective as Deku Sticks against Dead Hand?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Tree Compass#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Tree Compass#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Lost Woods Near Goron City Grass 1

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key Ring#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Stray Fairy# and #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key Ring#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #the enemy souls of Dodongos Cavern# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Zora Shop#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key Ring# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
